title: Siraishi Serina Great Erotic Adventures - Novel Updates

tags: Adventurers   Affair   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Fantasy World   Fearless Protagonist   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Forced into a Relationship   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Level System   Magic   Masochistic Characters   M*sturbation   Misunderstandings   Perverted Protagonist   R-18   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Masanan   まさなん
description:
I am Shiraishi Serina. I am a second year high school student at Sakurafu Girl’s Academy. One day, I tried to create an ID for a social game, as recommended by a friend.

However, the site that came up in my search, “Game to Change Your Life,” didn’t have a field for me to enter my name, and there was a discrepancy between my friend’s explanation and what I was told. When I thought something was wrong, I was suddenly knocked unconscious and summoned naked to a magic circle.

It was a medieval European-style fantasy world where magic and monsters existed. According to the king, I’m a “hero” and he wants me to defeat the demon king.

All right, I have to find a way to cooperate with the five other heroes who were also summoned, defeat the Demon King, and quickly return to Japan.

This is a spinoff Otherworldly Warriors with erot*c Skills>
